Question
========
  
From the regression analysis performed on survey data on 99 participants it is apparent that there is a statistically significant positive
association between the number of minutes per day someone watches television and that person's *cholesterol concentration*. Part of the
regression output is provided below.

What percentage of the total variance in cholesterol concentration is explained in this model?
  
  
![](vufgb-rsquared-002-en-table01.jpg)

Answerlist
----------
  * 35.9%
* 64.1%
* 12.9%
* 87.1%

Solution
========
  
Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
